descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][color=#ff3f3f][b][font=Comic Sans MS][i]Abigail the Dynasty Warrior﻿[/i][/font]
[/b][/color][/size][/center] [color=#ff7700][size=3][b]﻿[INTRO][/b][/size][/color]
﻿﻿She is not Lulingki, but she is still a Dynasty Warrior
although with the same armor, they R different
She is ur housecarl waiting 4 u somewhere in whiterun

This MOD provides u with a standalone follower, u can simply find her in Drunk Hunters'
She is a strong Two-handed warrior master many shouts
Also the weapon and armor of her is playable, craft them in forge
But still mind, u can't craft them before u reach [color=#ff0000]LVL.30. [/color]( u shouldn't get them in very early stage for they r too power for u at that time...)
However, make sure u've installed [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30760/?]XPMs[/url] and [color=#ff00ff]UNPB Body[/color] for this armor is only made for [color=#ff00ff]UNPB-TBBP Max-Weight[/color]!
BTW, there r still some little problem on the the outfit, but i can't fix it recently, maybe later

[b][color=#9900ff][size=3]﻿[INSTALLATION][/size][/color][/b]
﻿Use Manager to install and uninstall this mod
﻿before u uninstall this MOD, try to make ur save clear in some ways!

﻿[color=#ff0000]PS:[/color]u may not find her for the first time, just restart the game, things will be OK

﻿[color=#ffff00][size=3][b][Credits][/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.koeitecmo.co.jp/]KOEI[/url] and Nerodemon for models and textures
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3583950/?]Xunian[/url] for Character face Edit and taking pictures
Myself for all the parts
CXX govern for fxxking rising housing price and taxs
JXX govern for foolish decision on many affairs
author: Ayase Haruto
